title: Crime Alert 04.08.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.08.19
description:
Judge rules prior convictions can used at trial of suspects who shot a wedding guest outside an Atlanta country club. University of Hartford drama studentallegedly stabs two classmates claiming he “acted a little too hard”. Two Arkansas men charged after taking turns shooting each other while wearing a bullet proof vest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
